title: The Supreme Position of Lord Ramachandra | Sri Suvyakta Narasimha Dasa
speaker: HG Suvyakta Narasimha Dasa

segments.key_quote: However, Lord Ramachandra continues to rule the hearts of people even after millions of years. Why? Because he is not an ordinary man. He is God.
segments.summary: This segment establishes Lord Ramachandra's enduring glory and asserts his divine status based on Vedic declarations, specifically referencing the Srimad Bhagavatam.

segments.key_quote: We can see here clearly that Lord Rama is declared to be the incarnation of the supreme personality of God and unequivocally in the Srimad Bhagavatam.
segments.summary: This segment reinforces Lord Ramachandra's status as an incarnation of the Supreme Personality of Godhead, citing verses from the Srimad Bhagavatam, Padma Purana, and Vishnu Dharmottara.

segments.key_quote: Thus in multiple places, apart from the Ramayana, Lord Rama has been declared to be an incarnation of the supreme personality of Godhead in the Vedas. And hence we accept him as such.
segments.summary: This segment concludes by emphasizing the widespread Vedic support for Lord Ramachandra being an incarnation of the Supreme Personality of Godhead, referencing the Brahma Samhita and reiterating the acceptance of this truth based on Vedic authority.
